responsibilities: Develop and implement comprehensive lesson plans for 10th-grade Biology and 12th-grade Physics aligned with state standards.
Facilitate hands-on laboratory experiments and ensure all safety protocols are strictly followed.
Assess student progress through a variety of formative and summative evaluations, providing detailed feedback to support academic growth.
Collaborate with the STEM department to integrate cross-disciplinary projects and enhance the science curriculum.
Completed a full-year teaching residency under a mentor teacher, managing three sections of General Science.
Designed and delivered a specialized unit on environmental sustainability that increased student engagement by 20%.
Provided one-on-one academic support and tutoring to students during after-school sessions.
Utilized classroom management software to track attendance, grades, and behavioral progress.
